content:
ENGLISH 义务教育教科书二年级下册义务教育教科书英语二年级下册 （一年级起点） （一年级起点） 英语全国价格举报电话：12315：4.70元 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语二年级下册 （一年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，新学期开始了！你们准备好了吗？ 上学期，你们学习了一些礼貌用语、知道了一些身体部位、数字和一些衣物的英语名称。你们肯定发现自己能说出更多的英语，会表达更多的内容了。 这学期你们跟着丹尼、詹妮和李明可以学到哪些新的英语知识，增长哪些英语能力呢？新学期，你们将学习字母、食物和你们喜欢的一些场所的名称。 同学们，只要你们积极参与到听听、说说、唱唱和做做的活动中，就一定会发现——学英语真是既容易又有趣！ 同学们，在英语学习中，你们要主动地听，积极地参与，敢于开口，不怕挑战，遇到困难大胆求助。这样，你们一定能学好英语！ 致同 学 
CONTENTS Unit 1 Back to School ···················1 Unit 2 Letters Are Fun! ···············17 Unit 3 Food and Drink ················33 Unit 4 Let’s Go and Play! ···········49 Word List ································· 65 Vocabulary ·······························67 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 Back to School 2 1 Listen and say! Lesson 1 Back to School Nice to see you, too. We are back to school! Hello! Nice to see you again. Look! I see my teacher. She is in the office.

content: 2 1 Listen and say! Lesson 1 Back to School Nice to see you, too. We are back to school! Hello! Nice to see you again. Look! I see my teacher. She is in the office. 3 2 Let’s sing! Welcome back. This is your classroom. How are you, My good friends ? How are you today ? I’m fine, thanks. Nice to see you again! 4 Lesson 2 What Do You See? 1 Listen and say! I see a blackboard. I see desks. I see chairs. What do you see ? blackboard crayon scissors paper 5 blackboard scissors pencil crayon chair book desk Let’s do it! 2 Look and match. 3 Let’s sing! We love to draw, A picture we make. First we get a pencil, Then paper we take. Paper and pencil, Drawing all day long. Drawing is fun, As we sing this little song! 6 Lesson 3 What Do You Do? 1 Listen and say! I cut with my scissors. What do you do in the classroom ? I read a book. I write with my pencil. I draw with my crayon.
